original_text: Jacob's family ate all the food that they had brought from Egypt. So Jacob said to his sons, ‘Go back to Egypt, and buy some more food for us.’
korean_text: 그들이 애굽에서 가져온 곡식을 다 먹으매 그 아버지가 그들에게 이르되 다시 가서 우리를 위하여 양식을 조금 사오라

sentences.original_text: Jacob's family ate all the food
that they had brought from Egypt
So Jacob said to his sons
and buy some more food for us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리를 위해 더 많은 음식을 사라
